name: 地學通論（一）
goals: Understanding important concepts of human geography based on the focus of places and regions, enhancing the ability to recognize geographical phenomenon and understand geographical environment.
Understanding important geographical methods and techniques in order to cultivate geographical literacies, human spirit, learning interests and related affection.

Through the relevant geographical concepts explained in the course, illustrating the relevant cultural landscape or social phenomenon cases in daily life, and enhancing the basic ability of analyzing problems.
